text: The Rajko MitiÄ‡ Stadium (), previously known as Red Star Stadium (), also known as Marakana (), is a football stadium in Belgrade, the capital city of Serbia. Red Star Belgrade is a only club that is playing there, making it their stadium. title: Red Star Stadium
